definitions.definition: An equivalent returned for anything given, done, or suffered; compensation ; reward ; amends; requital.
That which compensates for an injury, or other type of harm or damage.
examples: He offered money as recompense for the damage, but what the injured party wanted was an apology.

main_definition: An equivalent returned for anything given, done, or suffered; compensation ; reward ; amends; requital.
secondary_definitions: That which compensates for an injury, or other type of harm or damage.
